page.title: 15Trade.
page.content: In our area there is a wide variety of trade ranging from a post office which sells newspapers and groceries,a wholesale butchers,a general store,a grocery shop and a saddlers,which is owned by a master saddler,a rare craft these days.There is also a sawmill,a drainage contractor and mobile vans, selling groceries,fish and chips,and icecream.A taxidermist,woodcarver and potter have workshops and the only garage sells petrol,sweets and car and bicycle accessories.The wholesale butchers was established in 1897 as a butchers shop,but now includes an abbatoir. Other amenities available locally are a hairdresser,mobile library,picture framer,plumber and electrician.Although it is possible to buy almost anything in the village the prices tend to be higher than those of the large stores in the nearby towns.
